Data Science Services

Data science helps organisations investigate their data in search of business comprehension. We help organisations optimize on data analytics and insights for business strategies. We assist in analysis of data to provide business apprehension through Big Data technologies.

Data Protection & Privacy

Data protection is critical in the wake of various legislations across jurisdictions in the world. In compliance with Data Protection Act 2019, we provide training and awareness sessions to organisations for the need of compliance with the Act and other related data protection laws across the world. We further, assist organisations develop data protection policies which are compliant with the Data Protection Act 2019, General Data Protection Regulations (GDPR), UK Data Protection Law and any other data protection laws that could affect operations of the businesses.

Insights

Welcome to the Maribel-Hermans knowledge center where we provide current updates on governance, risk & compliance and industry patterns. Our team conducts research and appraise ourselves with current changes in the market aimed at advising our clients. We commit and deliver. Give us the opportunity and you wait for returns.
